title: FermiHDI HD License Schema
description: Schema for a FermiHDI HD License File

id.description: A UID unique identifier for the dataset

versionNumber.description: The version number of this license

term.description: When is the length of this license in seconds

issue_date.description: When was this license issued as a Unix Epoch timestamp (seconds)

validity_date.description: When will this license become valid as a Unix Epoch timestamp (seconds)

expire_date.description: When will this license expire as a Unix Epoch timestamp (seconds)

count.description: The number of units this license allows for this element

dms.description: Information about the client's DMS for which this license was issued

id.description: The of ID such as hostname or IP address of the client's DMS for which this license was issued

publicKeyAlgorithm.description: The type of the public key for the client's DMS

publicKey.description: The public key for the client's DMS

keyFingerprint.description: The fingerprint for the client's DMS private key
The fingerprint for the FermiHDI public key

signature.description: The HMAC of the license encrypted by the FermiHDI HD signing key

dmsSignature.description: The HMAC signature signed by FermiHDI but using the client's DMS public key, for all elements except the licenseVerification at the same level
